Title: Wish You Were Here
Plot: With Karen gone, Hank has to deal with a more and more rebellious Becca. Meanwhile, Charlie and Marcy move back together though they still plan to divorce each other.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Kathleen Turner, Peter Gallagher, Embeth Davidtz, Diane Farr, Ellen Davis Woglom, Jason Beghe, Alicia Witt, Craig Aldrich, Kristine Blackport, Bruce Katzman, Luenell
